sent.orig: There will be a final exam during exam week, a mid-term exam on Lec #14.
sent.trans: 在第14节课时会进行期中考试，在考试周会进行期终考试。

sent.orig: Article Nine MOP organizes experts to approve of the exam subjects, exam outline, and exam paper.
sent.trans: 第九条人事部组织专家审定考试科目、试大纲和试题。

sent.orig: There will be a final exam during exam week, and a mid-term exam on Lec #14.
sent.trans: 在第14节课时会进行期中考试，并在考试周进行期终考试。

sent.orig: Your doctor will do a physical exam including a pelvic exam with pap smear.
sent.trans: ─医生将进行一次体检，包括以巴氏涂片法进行一次骨盆检查。

sent.orig: This intensive exam prep workshop will prepare you to pass the PMP exam.
sent.trans: 这一集中考试准备课程帮助你准备参加PMP测试。
